name: SA FICA - Individual Client
description: FICA-compliant onboarding for individual clients in South Africa

checklistTemplate.name: SA FICA - Individual Client Onboarding
checklistTemplate.description: FICA Schedule 3 compliance checklist for individual clients

items.name: Verify identity document
items.description: Obtain and verify a certified copy of the client's South African ID or passport
items.requiredDocumentLabel: Certified copy of SA ID or passport

items.name: Verify residential address
items.description: Obtain proof of residential address (utility bill, bank statement, or municipal account, not older than 3 months)
items.requiredDocumentLabel: Proof of address (not older than 3 months)

items.name: Complete risk assessment
items.description: Assess the client's ML/TF risk rating based on FICA Schedule 3

items.name: Verify source of funds
items.description: For high-risk clients or transactions above the prescribed threshold, obtain source of funds documentation

items.name: Sanctions and PEP screening
items.description: Screen the client against sanctions lists and determine PIP status
